fields.Title: SOUTHCOAST / SUNKEN MOTOR CARRIAGE
fields.Description: Tyre tracks lead to a sunken motor carriage.
fields.Placement:
Area: the sunken motor carriage in the sea. much fun
Details:

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It must be cold and lonely down the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It must be cold and lonely down there, in the icy water.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My guess is it started its journey..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My guess is it started its journey from the plaza, where it backed through the fence."

fields.Title: You: "I should investigate."
fields.Dialogue Text: I should investigate.

fields.Title: You: ""How long will it take for the low..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How long will it take for the low tide to come in?"

fields.Title: You: ""Haha, very funny -- so I can't whi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Haha, very funny -- so I can't whistle."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't think I'm ever gonna find..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think I'm ever gonna find my gun." (Look around.) "The world is so big and my gun is so small..."

fields.Title: You: "Squint your eyes and say: "Is that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Squint your eyes and say: "Is that a number on the side?" (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "No matter how many times you say it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No matter how many times you say it, it won't change the truth.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "You were not."
fields.Dialogue Text: You were not.

fields.Title: You: ""What's your favourite blue thing?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's your favourite blue thing?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "With his lips puckered the lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With his lips puckered the lieutenant lets out a beautiful melodic trill that puts even the Insulindic thrush to shame.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Yes, Harry, it's the number 41. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, Harry, it's the number 41. The number of our precinct. I hoped you would come back for me...

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Remember the tyre tracks in Martina..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Remember the tyre tracks in Martinaise? This is where they were leading.

fields.Title: You: ""We don't have time for traffic hoo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We don't have time for traffic hooliganism right now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""I miss my parents...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I miss my parents..."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Well, napalm ants for example are u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Well, napalm ants for example are used in some rites of passage rituals...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "A massive pit opens up in your stom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A massive pit opens up in your stomach and the most terrible feeling comes over you.

fields.Title: You: ""Things were going so well, we were..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Things were going so well, we were just whistling merrily..."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["village.sunken_whisper_rc_success"] == true  and  Variable["village.i_miss_my_mum"] == false  and  Variable["village.sunken_suprised_peoples_skin_colour_varies_so_drastically"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective," he says almost gently...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective," he says almost gently. "We *don't*. A rescue operation really isn't viable at this point."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well..." The lieutenant shrugs. "L..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well..." The lieutenant shrugs. "Life has a way of pulling the rug from under your feet. But things can only go up from here."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "A massive pit opens up in your stom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A massive pit opens up in your stomach and the most terrible feeling comes over you.

fields.Title: Logic: "Does he know something about that s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Does he know something about that speedracer?

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The clouds pass in the sky and the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The clouds pass in the sky and the shadow of the swing moves like the hour hand on a time piece... Thirty minutes have passed.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "That *rebel* who jumped the canal a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That *rebel* who jumped the canal and broke the waterlock! This is their doing.

fields.Title: You: "This is where the rebel who jumped..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is where the rebel who jumped the canal ended up. Not so daring anymore!
fields.Alternate1: "This is where the rebel who jumped the canal ended up. Not so daring anymore!"

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The seawater has already started to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The seawater has already started to corrode the metalworks.

fields.Title: You: "I don't have time for traffic hooli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't have time for traffic hooliganism right now. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "A seagull takes off from the half-s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A seagull takes off from the half-submerged machine. It's almost like the bird is acknowledging your decision.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The lieutenant's estimate is correc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's estimate is correct. The incident probably occurred on Sunday eve.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just keep at it, it will come to y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just keep at it, it will come to you."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Forty-one, Precinct 41. A massive p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Forty-one, Precinct 41. A massive pit opens up in your stomach and the most terrible feeling comes over you.

fields.Title: You: ""But Jacob Irw...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But Jacob Irw..."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["village.sunken_kim_no_streetracer_you_did_it"] == true  and  Variable["tc.jacob_irw"] == true  and  Variable["village.sunken_kitsuragi_just_shakes_his_head"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""They're not gonna take me back aft..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're not gonna take me back after this, are they?"

fields.Title: You: ""Things were going so well, we were..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Things were going so well, we were just talking about our mums..."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["village.sunken_whisper_rc_success"] == false  and  Variable["village.i_miss_my_mum"] == true  and  Variable["village.sunken_suprised_peoples_skin_colour_varies_so_drastically"] == false

fields.Title: You: "I don't wanna hear about that."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't wanna hear about that.

fields.Title: Endurance: "You feel like you're about to faint..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You feel like you're about to faint and fall off the swing. Your hands get clammy and the air tastes sour to breathe.

fields.Title: You: "How do we get you out?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How do we get you out?

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The sooner you accept it, the soone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sooner you accept it, the sooner you can move on.

fields.Title: You: ""But... if someone puts a gun to yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But... if someone puts a gun to your head?"

fields.Title: You: ""I've been thinking: if I put enoug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've been thinking: if I put enough time into eating right and exercising, I could turn myself into a living weapon. Then I wouldn't even need a gun..."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Yes it is. It feels as the city beh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes it is. It feels as the city behind you grows silent in the waiting. Seems like an eternity has passed...

fields.Title: You: "I should investigate."
fields.Dialogue Text: I should investigate.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's investigate.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's investigate."

fields.Title: You: "What is the make of this MC? Can I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is the make of this MC? Can I see a logo?

fields.Title: You: ""Yet another case of the engine dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yet another case of the engine displacement triumphing over the driver's IQ."

fields.Title: You: ""No, it's the street racer.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's the street racer."

fields.Title: You: ""First my badge and now THIS.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "First my badge and now THIS."
fields.Alternate1: "The badge, the gun -- and now THIS."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't have that kind of money.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't have that kind of money."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Yes, Harry. You did."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, Harry. You did.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The motor carriage sits in the salt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The motor carriage sits in the salty ocean water, cold and sad. It doesn't have an opinion.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The motor carriage sits in the salt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The motor carriage sits in the salty ocean water, cold and sad. It doesn't have an opinion.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "The hinges creak under your weight..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The hinges creak under your weight -- dangerously so.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Two birds on a wire, whistling by t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Two birds on a wire, whistling by the seaside. Looking at the water. And a sunken car.

fields.Title: You: ""Can you make out the marque now?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can you make out the marque now?"

fields.Title: Logic: "Does he know something about the dr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Does he know something about the driver of this vehicle?

fields.Title: Half Light: "Oh god, Harry! Oh god, Harry, what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh god, Harry! Oh god, Harry, what did you do...?!

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "There is also a *fourth* thing you'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is also a *fourth* thing you've lost.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You can still whistle," the lieute..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You can still whistle," the lieutenant says with a smile. "Besides, the night is always darkest before the dawn."

fields.Title: You: ""OH GOD, IT *IS* MINE! I DROVE MY C..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "OH GOD, IT *IS* MINE! I DROVE MY CAR INTO THE SEA!!!"

fields.Title: You: "They're not gonna take me back afte..."
fields.Dialogue Text: They're not gonna take me back after this, are they?

fields.Title: You: "Run your hand over the cold metal."
fields.Dialogue Text: Run your hand over the cold metal.

fields.Title: Drama: "Spit flies from your mouth to your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Spit flies from your mouth to your moustache, your chest, the ground before you... No sound though.
fields.Alternate1: Spit flies from your mouth, spraying your chest and landing on the ground before you. No sound though.

fields.Title: You: ""Man, this is taking a long time.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Man, this is taking a long time."

fields.Title: You: "I wonder what all these people in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I wonder what all these people in the city behind me are doing...

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The motor carriage sits in the salt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The motor carriage sits in the salty ocean water, cold and sad, and doesn't provide an immediate answer.

fields.Title: You: ""We don't have time for traffic hoo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We don't have time for traffic hooliganism right now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Did you say something, lieutenant?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you say something, lieutenant?"

fields.Title: You: "Keep blowing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep blowing.

fields.Title: You: ""I would like to see you try in thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would like to see you try in this bloody wind."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid so, yes. It looks like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid so, yes. It looks like you drove your police motor carriage into the sea, after you jumped across the canal."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm afraid so, yes. It looks like you started in front of the Whirling, jumped over the canal and then drove your vehicle in the sea right here."

fields.Title: You: ""So it's just gonna *be* there like..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So it's just gonna *be* there like that?!"

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "C'mon, Harry... There's nowhere to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: C'mon, Harry... There's nowhere to run. It's just you and me, old friend.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "It's impossible to say if it's happ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's impossible to say if it's happening, if the water is receding. All you feel is a lot of time going by.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant must think it's rath..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant must think it's rather funny. He smiles and quickly turns away.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Your voice echoes on the water, str..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your voice echoes on the water, strange and out of place in the environment. Thirty more minutes pass.

fields.Title: You: ""Is that a Coupris 40?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is that a Coupris 40?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at his wristwa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks at his wristwatch. "The world turns as fast as it wants."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The seawater has already started to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The seawater has already started to corrode the metalworks.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "A seagull takes off from the half-s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A seagull takes off from the half-submerged machine. It's almost like the bird is acknowledging your decision.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The sad sunken vehicle refuses to r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The sad sunken vehicle refuses to respond.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think I know now, what my favour..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think I know now, what my favourite blue thing is." He nods. "Yes, my favourite blue thing is a blue police uniform... or blue police livery."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sorry, Harry. I'm so sorry.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry, Harry. I'm so sorry."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, not *cheaper*. This motor ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, not *cheaper*. This motor carriage costs 40,000 rel... but in the long run it stills makes more sense to buy a new machine than try to refurbish this."

fields.Title: You: ""People are gonna be angry at me, a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "People are gonna be angry at me, aren't they? In Precinct 41."

fields.Title: You: "I can fix it."
fields.Dialogue Text: I can fix it.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "It's sad that no one and nothing bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's sad that no one and nothing but the sunken vehicle is here to witness it, but the unexpected beauty of the tune lifts your spirits nonetheless.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I believe it's following a pattern..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I believe it's following a pattern set millions of years ago by cosmic forces... But I suppose it *could* move quicker, yes."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Just like how the crazy daredevil p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just like how the crazy daredevil piloting that vehicle must have accelerated into the sea!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well..." The lieutenant rubs his c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well..." The lieutenant rubs his chin. "Historically, leeches have been used to prevent and even cure many ailments..."

fields.Title: You: "I don't have time for traffic hooli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't have time for traffic hooliganism right now. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "I don't have time for traffic hooli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't have time for traffic hooliganism right now. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Let's investigate.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's investigate."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Of course. Everything's okay."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course. Everything's okay.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The ice hasn't closed around the v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The ice hasn't closed around the vehicle yet..." He leans forward to peek into the cold water. "My guess is it's been here since last Saturday or Sunday."

fields.Title: You: ""Looks like the factory made a mist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like the factory made a mistake and accidentally called this one Coupris 41." (Scoff.) "Stupid factory."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid it will have to *be* th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid it will have to *be* there like that for many years." He looks around. "Look at it -- parts of it might be salvageable, but overall this machine is a write-off."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's face it, this is a substanti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's face it, this is a substantial loss to your district's budget." He's avoiding your gaze now. "I mean, my station only has four other vehicles in addition to my Kineema..."

fields.Title: You: "Maybe I was in pursuit of someone."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe I was in pursuit of someone.

fields.Title: You: ""No, I mean seriously, it's just a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I mean seriously, it's just a coincidence..."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Although the sunken motor carriage..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Although the sunken motor carriage is probably flattered by you addressing it, it does not supply an answer.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Clouds on the horizon grow darker a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Clouds on the horizon grow darker and the shadow of the swing set keeps climbing. You hear the distant rumble of the city. Thirty minutes pass...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Luckily, I am already a member of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Luckily, I am already a member of an independent organization, and therefore do not have to choose between a rock and a hard place."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Forty-one. What do you think..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Forty-one. What do you think it stands for?"

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Yes. Number 41. As in: Precinct 41...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. Number 41. As in: Precinct 41. C'mon, man -- that's our ride!

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The motor carriage sits in the salt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The motor carriage sits in the salty ocean water, cold and sad. It doesn't have an opinion.

fields.Title: You: "I don't have time for this right no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't have time for this right now. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "How long has it been here?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How long has it been here?

fields.Title: Logic: "Great idea! Then we can get the thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Great idea! Then we can get the things inside. The joyrider must have left something good inside. Guns? Papers? Maybe a cool jacket? A joyrider jacket?

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "A joyrider jacket? You feel a stran..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A joyrider jacket? You feel a strange connection to this joyrider. Maybe he's from some kind of Joyriders district and likes blue and white racing livery? Like a cop would.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "You hear the sound echo on the larg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear the sound echo on the large body of water. Clouds race across the spring sky and suddenly you just feel better. About everything.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "'Okay,' he's thinking. 'I can do th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'Okay,' he's thinking. 'I can do this. Let's do this. Who'd want to sit on an anthill? There are no therapeutic benefits to..."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "A dim light scatters from the cloud..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A dim light scatters from the cloud cover above the city. In it you can see the *blue and white motor carriage* slowly appear  from the water -- centimetre by centimetre as the sea recedes...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, I've been able to make..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Detective, I've been able to make out the marque ever since we arrived. I find it odd that you haven't. It's a Coupris, Model 40." His eyes turn to you.

fields.Title: You: ""I hate guessing. District somethin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hate guessing. District something? A *precinct*? Something municipal?" (Rub your temples -- you're getting a horrible headache.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But it could also be," he tilts hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But it could also be," he tilts his head and stresses: "... the number of a police precinct. Precinct 41 -- *your* precinct."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "I'm so sorry, Harry."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm so sorry, Harry.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Oh god, Harry! Oh god, Harry, what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh god, Harry! Oh god, Harry, what did you do...?!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives you a quick gl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant gives you a quick glance. Then, still looking straight ahead, he joins you with a higher-pitched and slightly more melodic trill.

fields.Title: You: "A carriage in the sea? Where did th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A carriage in the sea? Where did this come from?
fields.Alternate1: "A carriage in the sea? Where did this come from?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It appears to be so." The lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It appears to be so." The lieutenant has a peculiar look in his eyes as he inspects the wreckage.

fields.Title: You: ""We don't have time for traffic hoo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We don't have time for traffic hooliganism right now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Empathy: "It must be cold and lonely down the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It must be cold and lonely down there, in the icy water.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The seawater is already corroding t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The seawater is already corroding the fuel lines, metalworks, and undercarriage components. It's seeping into the various modules and short-circuiting the electrical systems, including the electro-magnetic steering and brakes...

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The motor carriage sits in the salt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The motor carriage sits in the salty ocean water, cold and sad. It doesn't have an opinion.

fields.Title: You: "I should investigate."
fields.Dialogue Text: I should investigate.

fields.Title: You: "I don't have time for traffic hooli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't have time for traffic hooliganism right now. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "Most suspicious. I should investiga..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Most suspicious. I should investigate.

fields.Title: You: ""We don't have time for traffic hoo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We don't have time for traffic hooliganism right now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Endurance: "Rust, moss, and sea life have alrea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Rust, moss, and sea life have already claimed it for themselves and initiated a slow decomposition process.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Quite." The lieutenant seems..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Quite." The lieutenant seems to be inspecting you more closely than the motor carriage.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know who my mum *or* my da..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know who my mum *or* my dad was..."

fields.Title: You: ""This must be Tommy 41, the morning..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This must be Tommy 41, the morning host of FM 41!"

fields.Title: You: ""Oh god, no...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh god, no..."

fields.Title: You: ""Things were going so well, we were..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Things were going so well, we were just talking how people have different skins..."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["village.sunken_whisper_rc_success"] == false  and  Variable["village.sunken_suprised_peoples_skin_colour_varies_so_drastically"] == true  and  Variable["village.i_miss_my_mum"] == true

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It's lost forever. Into the deepest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's lost forever. Into the deepest of seas.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "After losing every single thing you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: After losing every single thing you were entrusted with? I wouldn't hold my breath.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm..." The lieutenant is staring..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm..." The lieutenant is staring at the wreck. "Let me think about it..."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Suddenly you're reminded of the lie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Suddenly you're reminded of the lieutenant's Kineema and the weird feeling about the fish and seaweed you had...

fields.Title: You: "I don't have time for this right no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't have time for this right now. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree," the lieutenant replies,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree," the lieutenant replies, a curious look in his eyes. "We should *definitely* investigate."

fields.Title: You: ""Mhmh-mhmh...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhmh-mhmh..."

fields.Title: You: "Can I make out the marque now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Can I make out the marque now?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At least we have a pretty good sus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At least we have a pretty good suspect. If we found your motor carriage in the sea, maybe we'll find her too."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "A banged up motor carriage lies hal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A banged up motor carriage lies half-submerged in the icy water, slowly sinking into the Insulindian ocean. Only the cabin top, rear wheels and the engine remain visible.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, yes. Crazy recklessness." The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, yes. Crazy recklessness." The lieutenant glances at you. "I'd say it has been here since last Saturday or Sunday."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The motor carriage is properly stuc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The motor carriage is properly stuck in the ice. Getting it out would require a team of specialists.

fields.Title: You: ""And your eyes also used to...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And your eyes also used to..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It is indeed." The lieutenant nods..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is indeed." The lieutenant nods. "Or more accurately *was*."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The estimate is correct. The incide..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The estimate is correct. The incident probably occurred on Sunday evening.

fields.Title: Logic: "The damage is too extensive."
fields.Dialogue Text: The damage is too extensive.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "A seagull takes off from the half-s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A seagull takes off from the half-submerged machine. It's almost like the bird is acknowledging your decision.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The logo is too deep in the murky w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The logo is too deep in the murky water -- you can't make it out. But you *do* see a monkfish float by.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "As you sit down in the old, rusty p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you sit down in the old, rusty playground, the world around you becomes very silent.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A precinct, yes!" He tilts his hea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A precinct, yes!" He tilts his head and continues in a soft voice. "A police precinct. Precinct 41 -- *your* precinct."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There were never any street racers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There were never any street racers. It was always you. You drove your car in the sea."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant just shakes his head..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant just shakes his head.

fields.Title: You: "Oh, no-no-no-no-no. Mkm. Not happen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, no-no-no-no-no. Mkm. Not happening! Not on my watch.

fields.Title: You: ""First my badge and now THIS.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "First my badge and now THIS."
fields.Alternate1: "The badge, the gun -- and now THIS."

fields.Title: Volition: "Why the doom and gloom? It's just a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why the doom and gloom? It's just a sunken motor carriage. Some motor carriages are bound to end up in the sea.

fields.Title: Logic: "Wait for the low tide -- then you s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait for the low tide -- then you should be able to access the cabin.

fields.Title: You: ""...all I'm saying is I'm surprised..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...all I'm saying is I'm surprised people's skin colour varies so drastically."
fields.Alternate1: "...all I'm saying is I'm surprised people's skin colour varies so drastically. And that I miss my mum."

fields.Title: You: ""Do you think I will ever find my g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you think I will ever find my gun?"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.gun_missing"]  and  CheckItem("gun_villiers") == false  and  IsKimHere()

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "It's sunken too deep. There is no a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's sunken too deep. There is no access ramp to the coast.

fields.Title: Logic: "This was 20% of the station's vehic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This was 20% of the station's vehicular budget?

fields.Title: You: ""This is where the tracks on the pl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is where the tracks on the plaza were leading to."
fields.Alternate1: "So this is where all the tracks were leading to!"
fields.Alternate2: So this is where all the tracks were leading to!
fields.Alternate3: This is where the tracks on the plaza were leading to.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No..." The lieutenant looks at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No..." The lieutenant looks at the carriage and then at you. "Not so daring at all."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree," the lieutenant replies,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree," the lieutenant replies, a curious look in his eyes. "We should *definitely* investigate."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "With his lips puckered the lieutena..."]
You: ""I hope my mom isn't dead...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hope my mom isn't dead..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually not a coincidence. The Ki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually not a coincidence. The Kineema is the next generation sports edition of the old 'Forty', which was a real work horse. Favoured by the *police* all over the city..." He raises his finger.

fields.Title: Volition: "No! Just nope. Say no to this, Harr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No! Just nope. Say no to this, Harry.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, your car is in the sea. Face..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, your car is in the sea. Face it so we can start dealing with this."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of whom?" The lieutenant looks sce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of whom?" The lieutenant looks sceptical. "I don't think so. If anything... you were probably drunk."

fields.Title: You: ""I couldn't even pay a hostel bill.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I couldn't even pay a hostel bill."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""People are more valuable than mach..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "People are more valuable than machines." He's trying to cheer you up now. "Training a police officer is even more costly."

fields.Title: You: "Oh god, no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh god, no...

fields.Title: Jump to: [I can't believe you're here without Kim HUB]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Once again, differences in skin co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Once again, differences in skin colour are the result of melanin production, liver functions, regional adaptation, and various other factors."

fields.Title: You: "Oh sweet, a Coupris 40. A nice litt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh sweet, a Coupris 40. A nice little machine.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You get a sudden sinking feeling. S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You get a sudden sinking feeling. Stomach acid comes up as you look at the motor carriage in the deep, dark, cold water.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My guess is it started its journey..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My guess is it started its journey from the plaza, where it backed through the fence."

fields.Title: You: ""We don't have time for this right..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We don't have time for this right now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Let's investigate, Kim.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's investigate, Kim."

fields.Title: You: ""Let's investigate, Kim.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's investigate, Kim."

fields.Title: You: ""Enough gloating. This is serious.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Enough gloating. This is serious."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I did not." He gives you a blank s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did not." He gives you a blank stare. "But I'd say it has been here since last Saturday or Sunday."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, yes. Clearly this is a triump..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, yes. Clearly this is a triumph," he remarks dryly. "I'd say the vehicle has been here since last Saturday or Sunday."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "It might be a good idea to wait for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It might be a good idea to wait for the tide to recede.

fields.Title: You: ""I can still fix it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can still fix it."

fields.Title: You: ""I want it to be Jacob Irw, not me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I want it to be Jacob Irw, not me."

fields.Title: Half Light: "*People* yes, but not *you*."
fields.Dialogue Text: *People* yes, but not *you*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant adjusts his glasses..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant adjusts his glasses and doesn't say anything.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "More precious than the gun, the bad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: More precious than the gun, the badge and the motor carriage *combined*. Lost forever. Into the deepest of seas.

fields.Title: You: "Oh please, 41 could mean *SO* many..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh please, 41 could mean *SO* many things. It's not like I own the number.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "We don't."
fields.Dialogue Text: We don't.

fields.Title: Logic: "Unless someone... *someone* was try..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unless someone... *someone* was trying to fake his own death and start life anew...

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The motor carriage looks very sad s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The motor carriage looks very sad sitting all alone in the ice.

fields.Title: You: "Sit on the swing and wait for the t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sit on the swing and wait for the tide to recede.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, yes, it does.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, yes, it does."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "In some way it is still sad that no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In some way it is still sad that no living thing (other than seagulls) is here to witness a man in his prime trying to learn to whistle.

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, so both... ""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, so both... "

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Probably? Try definitely."
fields.Dialogue Text: Probably? Try definitely.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Dreaming, drinking, fucking, fighti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dreaming, drinking, fucking, fighting, trying to improve their lives. Wishing for a better tomorrow.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, yes..." (Rub your chin.) "Cra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, yes..." (Rub your chin.) "Crazy recklessness."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. An hour or two tops.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. An hour or two tops."

fields.Title: You: ""I guess that's just your way of sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess that's just your way of saying you'd side with the company."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Yes, the emblem, now visible above..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, the emblem, now visible above the waterline, belongs to the Coupris Motor Corporation. Below it stands the model name, *40*.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It's as if he knows what it stands..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's as if he knows what it stands for, but wants you to say it. It's pedagogical.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That is very unlikely," the lieute..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That is very unlikely," the lieutenant replies with a sigh. "All the electrics are toast. That goes for the electromagnetic steering and brake systems as well."

fields.Title: You: "A... fourth thing?"
fields.Dialogue Text: A... fourth thing?

fields.Title: I can't believe you're here without Kim HUB
You: "Even if the motor carriage *is* min..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even if the motor carriage *is* mine, literally anyone could have driven it into the sea.

fields.Title: Volition: "No! Just nope. Say no to this, Harr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No! Just nope. Say no to this, Harry.

fields.Title: You: "No, no... That's not true! It can't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, no... That's not true! It can't be...

fields.Title: You: "Whistle a tune."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whistle a tune.
fields.variable2: CheckEquipped("neck_bowtie")  and  CheckEquipped("shirt_interisolar")  and  (CheckEquipped("pants_interisolar")  or  CheckEquipped("pants_rcm"))

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "It's unclear whether the sunken veh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's unclear whether the sunken vehicle agrees or not, but merely uttering these words gives you the illusion of time speeding up.

fields.Title: You: ""If you have to side with either th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you have to side with either the strikers or the shipping company, who would you choose?"

fields.Title: You: ""Let's investigate.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's investigate."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No..." The lieutenant looks at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No..." The lieutenant looks at the carriage and then at you. "Not so daring at all."

fields.Title: You: "I should investigate."
fields.Dialogue Text: I should investigate.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "A seagull takes off from the half-s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A seagull takes off from the half-submerged machine. It's almost like the bird is acknowledging your decision.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The accident couldn't have happened..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The accident couldn't have happened too long ago. The ice hasn't closed up around the vehicle, so the crash must have happened last Saturday or Sunday.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Nothing but the sound of seagulls,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing but the sound of seagulls, high above in the sky, echoing like distant laughter. Ice cracks around the blue motor carriage in the sea.

fields.Title: Drama: "He's gloating at you. Oh, it's so e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's gloating at you. Oh, it's so easy for Mr. Teacher!

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Okay, okay... that's way better tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, okay... that's way better than what you did.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But it could also be," he tilts hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But it could also be," he tilts his head and stresses: "... the number of a police precinct. Precinct 41 -- *your* precinct."

fields.Title: You: ""No, no...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no..."

fields.Title: You: ""How do we get it out?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How do we get it out?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You'd be *lucky* to find one undam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You'd be *lucky* to find one undamaged component in there..." He shakes his head. "In a few months there will be nothing *but* rust left of this vehicle. It'll be cheaper to buy a new one..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can still do that," the lieuten..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We can still do that," the lieutenant says with a smile. "Besides, the night is always darkest before the dawn."

fields.Title: Endurance: "Something about his notion gives yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something about his notion gives you strength. Makes you realize this isn't the end of the road yet.

fields.Title: You: ""Well, at least I can see what's in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, at least I can see what's in there now." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Interfacing: "A single day in the salty seawater..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A single day in the salty seawater would ruin most vehicles, but this one looks worn even in places the saltwater hasn't touched it.

fields.Title: You: "What should I do?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What should I do?

fields.Title: You: ""Hold on, it looks very blue." (Poi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on, it looks very blue." (Point to the sunken vehicle.)

fields.Title: Drama: "The tune on your lips forms a stran..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The tune on your lips forms a strange, yet undeniably beautiful contrast with the surrounding bleakness.

fields.Title: You: ""So, was your dad also... you know...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, was your dad also... you know..." (Point to your eyes.)

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Looks like this might take a while...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Looks like this might take a while. Time to present a good topic for discussion.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree," the lieutenant replies,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree," the lieutenant replies, his eyes never leave the sunken vehicle. "We should definitely investigate."

fields.Title: Tutorial Agent: "Go to your inventory and interact w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go to your inventory and interact with the item by clicking the INTERACT tab and then INTERACT.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree," the lieutenant replies,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree," the lieutenant replies, a curious look in his eyes. "We should *definitely* investigate."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree," the lieutenant replies,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree," the lieutenant replies, a curious look in his eyes. "We should *definitely* investigate."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "A seagull takes off from the half-s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A seagull takes off from the half-submerged machine. It's almost like the bird is acknowledging your decision.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I agree," the lieutenant replies,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree," the lieutenant replies, his eyes never leave the sunken vehicle. "We should definitely investigate."

fields.Title: You: "Fish and seaweed... I thought this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fish and seaweed... I thought this was about Kim's car?

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The motor carriage does not dispute..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The motor carriage does not dispute your evaluation of the situation.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Papers? Papers would be cool. Maybe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Papers? Papers would be cool. Maybe there's registration inside? Like a person registration? You know, like your badge is!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's right. Just keep at it, it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right. Just keep at it, it will come to you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It is a simple and rugged machine,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It is a simple and rugged machine, favoured by working men, government offices..." He pauses to think. "Firefighters, animal control people. You know, *those* kinds of people."

fields.Title: You: ""Forty-one, huh? This street racer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forty-one, huh? This street racer is quite the ladies man."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right..." The lieutenant is lookin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right..." The lieutenant is looking at you peculiarly. "*Or* 41 is the number of a police precinct? Your precinct."

fields.Title: Endurance: "You feel like you're about to faint..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You feel like you're about to faint and fall off the swing. Your hands get clammy and the air tastes sour to breathe.

fields.Title: You: ""No, no, no." (Shake your head.) "N..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, no, no." (Shake your head.) "No. No. No..."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Your mocking tone finds no response..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your mocking tone finds no response but the motion of the waves.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's wait for the low tide and se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's wait for the low tide and see what's inside."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My dad and mum are both half-Seoli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My dad and mum are both half-Seolite."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm pretty sure I told you already, didn't I? My dad and mum are both half-Seolite."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It appears to be so." The lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It appears to be so." The lieutenant has a peculiar look in his eyes as he inspects the wreckage.

fields.Title: You: ""We don't have time for traffic hoo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We don't have time for traffic hooliganism right now." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Forty-one is his rank in the under..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forty-one is his rank in the underground street racing hierarchy." (Rub your chin.) "Small fish, this one."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Let's go take a look.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Let's go take a look."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "Keep moving. You're a shark. You st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep moving. You're a shark. You stop -- you die.

fields.Title: You: "Wait in silence."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait in silence.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Raining heavily here, chief -- mind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Raining heavily here, chief -- mind keeping it down a bit?

fields.Title: You: ""Would you rather sit on an anthill..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Would you rather sit on an anthill for an hour or stand in a river of leeches?"

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Yes. Why haven't you?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. Why haven't you?

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "It's sunken too deep."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's sunken too deep.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "The motor carriage sits in the salt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The motor carriage sits in the salty ocean water, cold and sad, and doesn't provide an immediate answer.

fields.Title: You: "Most suspicious. I should investiga..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Most suspicious. I should investigate.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "A seagull takes off from the half-s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A seagull takes off from the half-submerged machine. It's almost like the bird is acknowledging your decision.

fields.Title: Shivers: "The wind blows. In the distance, be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The wind blows. In the distance, behind the church, some vagrants are having an argument over a bag of tare they found in the reeds. Further away -- a flock of sea gulls lands.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "It's a Coupris Forty. A work horse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a Coupris Forty. A work horse of the motor park. Favoured by the working men, government offices, fire fighters I guess, maybe animal control people? You know. Those kinds of people.

fields.Title: You: ""You have a Coupris too. What a coi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You have a Coupris too. What a coincidence!"

fields.Title: Shivers: "In a little alley next to Boogie st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In a little alley next to Boogie street, a man in stained overalls steps out of a workshop for a cigarette. His hands are bruised and soaked with motor oil and dirt. He breathes smoke out of his nostrils and closes his eyes. The next five minutes are his and his alone.

fields.Title: You: ""It's not uncommon for race cars to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not uncommon for race cars to have numbers on them."

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe I was in pursuit of someone.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe I was in pursuit of someone."

fields.Title: You: ""Well, at least I can see what's in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, at least I can see what's in there now." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""THIS IS A DISASTER.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "THIS IS A DISASTER."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, it isn't. It's you. I'm very..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, it isn't. It's you. I'm very sorry."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "No, you can't."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, you can't.

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "An aggressive looking seagull lands..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An aggressive looking seagull lands on the swing set and stares at you with a murderous look. You really need to keep moving.

fields.Title: You: "The tide sure is taking its sweet t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The tide sure is taking its sweet time.
fields.Alternate1: "The tide sure is taking its sweet time."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's expression suddenl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's expression suddenly turns very serious. "God, I hope so."

fields.Title: Sunken Motor Carriage: "It probably used to be. All wet, be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It probably used to be. All wet, bent, and broken -- the old work horse has seen better days.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The seawater is already corroding t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The seawater is already corroding the fuel lines, metalworks, and undercarriage components. It's seeping into the various modules and short-circuiting the electrical systems, including the electro-magnetic steering and brakes...

fields.Title: You: ""Let's investigate.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's investigate."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Everything is *not* okay."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everything is *not* okay.

fields.Title: You: ""I understand, you're saying you're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I understand, you're saying you're siding with the Union."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually not a coincidence. The Ki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually not a coincidence. The Kineema is the next generation sports edition of the 'Forty', which was a real work horse. Favoured by the *police* all over the city." His expression is unreadable.

fields.Title: You: ""OH MY GOD, IT'S MINE, I DROVE MY C..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "OH MY GOD, IT'S MINE, I DROVE MY CAR INTO THE SEA????!?!?!?!?!!!??!!!!" (Proceed.)

fields.Title: You: ""Well, well, well. Looks like Jacob..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, well, well. Looks like Jacob Irw's journey came to an abrupt end here."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "What a clumsy wuss..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What a clumsy wuss...
